news.name: Countdown to the season opener: Day 97 Tom Rafferty
news.title: Countdown to the season opener: Day 97 Tom Rafferty
news.abstract: We’re counting down to the season opener (Day 97) with some Cowboys history
news.body: We’re counting down the days until the Dallas Cowboys battle the Philadelphia Eagles in the season opener of the 2025 NFL season. To pass the time and mark the days, we asked some of our writers to rank their top-100 players in Cowboys history u...

news.name: Yankees activate Giancarlo Stanton
news.title: Yankees activate Giancarlo Stanton
news.abstract: The slugging DH had been on the injured list since the beginning of the season, due to elbow injuries.
news.body:
NEW YORK - Giancarlo Stanton is back, and the AL East-leading Yankees' lineup is a little more dangerous.

On the injured list since Opening Day due to what amounted to severe tennis elbow in both elbows, Stanton was activated by the Yankees prior to Monday night's four-game series opener against the Angels.

news.name: UEFA Champions League final: TV channel, time, how to watch PSG vs. Inter Milan
news.title: UEFA Champions League final: TV channel, time, how to watch PSG vs. Inter Milan
news.abstract: The UEFA Champions League final brings Paris Saint-Germain and Inter Milan together for a massive game. How to watch Saturday's
news.body: The UEFA Champions League final is set for Saturday, with Paris Saint-Germain and Inter Milan battling for the right to claim European club soccer's biggest prize.

news.name: Prominent Erie sports figure Joe Mattis dies at 78
news.title: Prominent Erie sports figure Joe Mattis dies at 78
news.abstract: A beloved member of the Erie sports community has passed away. On Friday, May 30, Gannon University announced the death of Joe Mattis. He was 78 years old.
news.body:
(WJET/WFXP) — A beloved member of the Erie sports community has passed away.

On Friday, May 30, Gannon University announced the death of Joe Mattis. He was 78 years old.

news.name: Trump Wins Tariff Reprieve as Trade Agenda Faces Rollback
news.title: Trump Wins Tariff Reprieve as Trade Agenda Faces Rollback
news.abstract: A federal appeals court offered President Donald Trump a temporary reprieve from a ruling threatening to throw out the bulk of his sweeping tariff agenda, giving at least some hope to a White House now facing substantial new restrictions on its effort to rewrite the global trading order.
news.body:
(Bloomberg) --

A federal appeals court offered President Donald Trump a temporary reprieve from a ruling threatening to throw out the bulk of his sweeping tariff agenda, giving at least some hope to a White House now facing substantial new restrictions on its effort to rewrite the global trading order.

news.name: Democrats Slam Hegseth’s Plan to Cut Weapons-Testing Office
news.title: Democrats Slam Hegseth’s Plan to Cut Weapons-Testing Office
news.abstract: The top Democrat on the Senate Armed Services Committee slammed Pentagon plans to slash staffing at the office that oversees tests of major weapons systems, after Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth claimed the cuts would save the government $300 million.
news.body: (Bloomberg) -- The top Democrat on the Senate Armed Services Committee slammed Pentagon plans to slash staffing at the office that oversees tests of major weapons systems, after Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth claimed the cuts would save the government $300 million.

news.name: Judge Weighs Big Changes to Google, Including Breakup, AI Limits
news.title: Judge Weighs Big Changes to Google, Including Breakup, AI Limits
news.abstract: The federal judge who will decide how to limit Google’s monopoly in search is considering its advantage in artificial intelligence, and aiming to minimize harm to the other players in the market with any resolution.
news.body: (Bloomberg) -- The federal judge who will decide how to limit Google’s monopoly in search is considering its advantage in artificial intelligence, and aiming to minimize harm to the other players in the market with any resolution.

news.name: Taylor Swift Fans Are Full of Emotions After She Buys Back Her Masters: ‘Taylor ALWAYS Wins'
news.title: Taylor Swift Fans Are Full of Emotions After She Buys Back Her Masters: ‘Taylor ALWAYS Wins'
news.abstract: "I can now go back and listen to all of her original albums and not feel guilty," one fan wrote.
news.body: Taylor Swift fans are very, very used to the pop star surprising them - but she might have just outdone herself with the announcement that she's purchased back the masters to her first six albums, following an arduous six-year fight to do so.

news.name: $25K per night for a cruise? Look inside Regent Seven Seas' largest luxury suite ever.
news.title: $25K per night for a cruise? Look inside Regent Seven Seas' largest luxury suite ever.
news.abstract: Regent Seven Seas Cruises' new Skyview Regent Suite will include two bedrooms, a private gym, an in-suite elevator and more.
news.body: Imagine waking up on vacation in a bed facing the ocean, before heading to your private gym for a morning workout. From there, you could unwind in a personal massage room or take in the sea breeze from a wraparound balcony.

news.name: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, June 11 (game #731)
news.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, June 11 (game #731)
news.abstract: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzz...
news.body: Good morning! Let's play Connections, the NYT's clever word game that challenges you to group answers in various categories. It can be tough, so read on if you need Connections hints.

news.name: Families flock to Churchill Downs to celebrate Father's Day
news.title: Families flock to Churchill Downs to celebrate Father's Day
news.abstract: The racetrack's annual Father's Day celebration drew in large crowds and served as a great way to make memories with dad.
news.body: Churchill Downs was packed with families Sunday, all coming together to celebrate Father's Day in true Kentucky style with a day at the races.

news.name: ‘How to Train Your Dragon' Flies to No. 1 at China Box Office
news.title: ‘How to Train Your Dragon' Flies to No. 1 at China Box Office
news.abstract: Universal's live-action remake “How to Train Your Dragon” took flight at the top of the China box office over the June 13–15 weekend, opening with RMB79.7 million ($11.1 million), according to Artisan Gateway.
news.body: Universal's live-action remake "How to Train Your Dragon" took flight at the top of the China box office over the June 13–15 weekend, opening with RMB79.7 million ($11.1 million), according to Artisan Gateway.

news.name: Here Are the Top-Performing Stocks From the S&P 500 This Year
news.title: Here Are the Top-Performing Stocks From the S&P 500 This Year
news.abstract: The stock market has been one heck of a seesaw in 2025. A bit over a month ago, the S&P 500 was down more than 15% on the year and narrowly avoided an official bear market (in fact, it closed down 19% from its highs and touched bear territory intraday). The Nasdaq officially entered one.
news.body:
The stock market has been one heck of a seesaw in 2025.

A bit over a month ago, the S&P 500 was down more than 15% on the year and narrowly avoided an official bear market (in fact, it closed down 19% from its highs and touched bear territory intraday). The Nasdaq officially entered one.

news.name: Some good news at Newark Liberty: Port Authority to reopen a runway 13 days early
news.title: Some good news at Newark Liberty: Port Authority to reopen a runway 13 days early
news.abstract: The runway at Newark airport had been shut for a $121 million routine rehab and was scheduled to reopen June 15. It is now set t...
news.body: The Port Authority announced that it plans to reopen one of its runways undergoing repairs at Newark Liberty International Airport 13 days ahead of schedule.

news.name: Foreigners claim £1bn a month in benefits
news.title: Foreigners claim £1bn a month in benefits
news.abstract: Benefits claims by households with at least one foreign national have doubled to nearly £1 billion a month in the past three years, government figures show.
news.body: Benefits claims by households with at least one foreign national have doubled to nearly £1 billion a month in the past three years, government figures show.

news.name: Breast-cancer checks could begin as young as 30 to catch disease early
news.title: Breast-cancer checks could begin as young as 30 to catch disease early
news.abstract: Women could be offered breast-cancer checks from the age of 30 under a new approach being trialled by the NHS.
news.body: Women could be offered breast-cancer checks from the age of 30 under a new approach being trialled by the NHS.

news.name: Watch: Burglar uses smoke grenades and sledgehammer in Claridge’s raid
news.title: Watch: Burglar uses smoke grenades and sledgehammer in Claridge’s raid
news.abstract: A burglar used a sledgehammer and smoke grenades while trying to steal jewels worth £190,000 from Claridge’s hotel in Mayfair.
news.body:
Credit: CPS

A burglar used a sledgehammer and smoke grenades while trying to steal jewels worth £190,000 from Claridge’s hotel in Mayfair.

news.name: Worlds of Fun owner cuts jobs ahead of busy summer season
news.title: Worlds of Fun owner cuts jobs ahead of busy summer season
news.abstract: The news became public at the same time Oceans of Fun is opening for the season.
news.body: KANSAS CITY, Mo. (KCTV) - The parent company of Worlds of Fun is laying off employees, including cuts at the Kansas City amusement park.
